definitions.definition: To use a knife to injure or kill by stabbing , slashing , or otherwise using the sharp edge of the knife as a weapon .
examples: She was repeatedly knifed in the chest.

definitions.definition: To cut through as if with a knife .
examples: The boat knifed through the water.

definitions.definition: To betray , especially in the context of a political slate .
To positively ignore , especially in order to denigrate ; compare cut .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To cut with a knife .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To use a knife to injure or kill by stabbing , slashing , or otherwise using the sharp edge of the knife as a weapon .
( intransitive ) To cut through as if with a knife .
( transitive ) To betray , especially in the context of a political slate .
( transitive ) To positively ignore , especially in order to denigrate ; compare cut .
